executable.title: UpdateParticlesData
executable.description: This program can be applied to particles data sets created by older versions of the CIP in order to make them compliant with the current CIP version.
executable.contributor: Applied Chest Imaging Laboratory, Brigham and Women's Hospital
executable.acknowledgements: This work is funded by the National Heart, Lung, And Blood Institute of the National Institutes of Health under Award Number R01HL116931. The content is solely the responsibility of the authors and does not necessarily represent the official views of the National Institutes of Health.

geometry.name: inFileName
geometry.label: inFileName
geometry.description: Input particles file name (VTK polydata file)].

geometry.name: outFileName
geometry.label: out FileName
geometry.description: Output particles file name (VTK polydata file).
